<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->
# Block Node Formatting

Represents a Ruby block that is passed to a method (`proc { |foo| bar }`)
<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
foo {}
```

After:

```ruby
foo {}
```

## Consolidates a block to oneline

Before:

```ruby
->() {

}
```

After:

```ruby
-> {}
```

## Breaks up statements

Before:

```ruby
->() {
  break 1
  next 2
}
```

After:

```ruby
-> do
  break 1
  next 2
end
```
